settings.title: Publication Date Field
settings.description: The listing will remain unpublished until this date.
settings.name: listing_publication_date

settings.title: Expiration Date Field
settings.description: The listing will no longer be published after this date.
settings.name: listing_expiration_date

settings.title: Detail Page Related Listings Widgets
settings.keywords: widget, related listings, favorites, detail page
settings.description: Setup a related listings widget to be displayed in the listing detail page.

settings.title: Listing Title Live Search
settings.keywords: search, listing, title, live, submit, duplicate
settings.name: listing_title_livesearch_enable
